text: Jot Singh Gunsola is an Indian politician from Uttarakhand and a two term Member of the Uttarakhand Legislative Assembly. Gunsola represents the Mussoorie (Uttarakhand Assembly constituency). He twice served as the Chairman of Mussoorie Municipal Council. Gunsola is a member of the Indian National Congress. ==Positions held== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year ! title: Jot Singh Gunsola
